name: 360 days of tank premium account
details: Having a premium account allows you to develop faster in the game, providing an additional 50% to earnings of credits and experience. The premium account is the same for World of Tanks, World of Warships and World of Warplanes, therefore, buying it for one game, you automatically get it in the others.
